title: Eat, Eat
picture_context: Children sitting and eating bread together on the floor.
vignette: יִצְחָק אוֹכֵל לֶחֶם. אֶבֶן אוֹכֵל לֶחֶם. אַבָּל לֶחֶם אֵין. אֲרוּאֵלְיָה צְרִיכָה לֶחֶם! מִינְיוֹנִים הֵבִיאוּ לֶחֶם. אַחְשָׁו כֻּלָּם אוֹכְלִים לֶחֶם.
description: Shows subject-verb agreement, simple present action ('eat'), and repeated nominal subject for clarity and repetition. Also illustrates the use of negatives.

title: Sit and Stand
picture_context: Children change from sitting to standing, sometimes as humans, sometimes as animals.
vignette: יִצְחָק יוֹשֵׁב. אֶבֶן עוֹמֵד. אָרוּאֵלְיָה יוֹשֶׁבֶת. יִצְחָק עוֹמֵד. וְאָבוֹ אֲרוּאֵלְיָה יוֹשֵׁב.
description: Uses basic nominal and verb forms to contrast 'sit' and 'stand,' highlighting simple verb paradigms and subject agreement.

title: The Blanket
picture_context: A child looks for a missing blanket, others help.
vignette: אֵין שְׂמִיכָה. יִצְחָק מְבַקֵּשׁ שְׂמִיכָה. אֶבֶן מְבַקֵּשׁ שְׂמִיכָה. אָרוּאֵלְיָה מְצָא שְׂמִיכָה!
description: Exposes repetitive verb usage, especially searching and finding, with direct object agreement on feminine nouns.

title: Big and Small
picture_context: Children measure stacks of blocks—one tall, one short.
vignette: הַמִּגְדָּל גָּדוֹל. גָּדוֹל מְאֹד. הַמִּגְדָּל קָטָן. קָטָן מְאֹד.
description: Illustrates attribute adjective placement and repetition to reinforce the agreement and comparison of adjectives (big vs. small).

title: Cry and Hug
picture_context: A sad child is comforted by a dog hugging them.
vignette: אֶבֶן עָצֵב. אֶבֶן בּוֹכֶה. שֶׁנְזִי בָּאָה. שֶׁנְזִי חוֹבֶקֶת אֶת אֶבֶן. אֶבֶן שָׂמֵחַ.
description: Demonstrates simple emotional state verbs and verbs with pronominal direct objects.

title: Book with Advice
picture_context: A child reading a book, smiling with a 'light bulb' expression.
vignette: יִצְחָק קוֹרֵא סֵפֶר. בַּסֵּפֶר עֵצָה טוֹבָה. עֵצָה טוֹבָה לְיִצְחָק.
description: Shows the use of verbs for reading with an object, and simple noun-adjective agreement.

title: Need and Gift
picture_context: A group of minions presents a toy to the children.
vignette: אַבָּל יֵשׁ צֹרֶךְ. יֵשׁ לָנוּ צֹרֶךְ. הַמִּינְיוֹנִים הֵבִיאוּ מַתָּנָה. הִנֵּה מַתָּנָה!
description: Emphasizes existential 'יש/אין' structures and uses verbs for giving/bringing with repeated direct object.

title: Poop and Return
picture_context: A child runs to the bathroom; other kids wave.
vignette: אַרוּאֵלְיָה צוֹעֶקֶת: צוֹאָה! אַרוּאֵלְיָה רָצָה. אַרוּאֵלְיָה חוֹזֶרֶת.
description: Provides use of exclamation and present/returning actions, with succinct action sequence.

title: We Love Each Other
picture_context: All the children hug after a quarrel.
vignette: יִצְחָק כּוֹעֵס עַל אֶבֶן. אֶבֶן כּוֹעֵס עַל יִצְחָק. אָרוּאֵלְיָה זוֹכֶרֶת אַהֲבָה. עַכְשָׁו כֻּלָּם חוֹבְקִים.
description: Highlights verbs for emotional states (anger, remembering), and group action (hugging each other) with repetition.

title: Take and Give
picture_context: Children passing a toy from one to another.
vignette: יִצְחָק לוֹקֵחַ דֹּבֶר. אָרוּאֵלְיָה נוֹתֶנֶת אֵל יִצְחָק. יִצְחָק נוֹתֵן לְאֶבֶן.
description: Reinforces subject-verb-object structure and direct object transfer, highlighting the change of possession.

title: See and Hear
picture_context: One child points to an animal, another listens.
vignette: אֶבֶן רוֹאֶה דּוֹב. יִצְחָק שׁוֹמֵעַ קוֹל. אַרוּאֵלְיָה רוֹאָה.
description: Exemplifies perception verbs with matching subjects/objects; repetition builds recognition of action and participant.

title: Up and Down
picture_context: Children climb stairs, then come down.
vignette: אֶבֶן עוֹלֶה. אֶבֶן יוֹרֵד. יִצְחָק עוֹלֶה. יִצְחָק יוֹרֵד.
description: Contrasts two simple, highly frequent motion verbs while showing inflection for different subjects.

title: Open and Close
picture_context: Children open and close a door together.
vignette: יִצְחָק פֹּתֵחַ דֶּלֶת. אָרוּאֵלְיָה סוֹגֶרֶת דֶּלֶת. דֶּלֶת פְּתוּחָה. דֶּלֶת סְגוּרָה.
description: Demonstrates basic verb-object and adjective-noun forms with alternation and repetition.

title: Book Inside, Book Outside
picture_context: A child reading inside a house, another outdoors.
vignette: יִצְחָק קוֹרֵא סֵפֶר בַּבַּיִת. אֶבֶן קוֹרֵא סֵפֶר בַּחוּץ.
description: Shows the use of simple locative prepositions with direct objects.

title: Many and Few
picture_context: Children with many blocks; another with just one.
vignette: יֵשׁ רַב קוּבְיוֹת. יֵשׁ מְעַט קוּבְיוֹת.
description: Contrasts quantity adjectives and use of existential phrases with plural objects.

title: Who Has?
picture_context: Children look at each other and check their hands.
vignette: לְמִי יֵשׁ סֵפֶר? לְיִצְחָק יֵשׁ סֵפֶר.
description: Demonstrates possessive structure using ל־ and emphasizes question/answer pairing.

title: Day and Night
picture_context: Children play under the sun, later under the stars.
vignette: בַּיּוֹם נִשְׂחָקִים. בַּלַּיְלָה נִשְׁכָּבִים. בַּיּוֹם נִקְרָא סֵפֶר.
description: Simple use of temporal adverbs and passive verbs; shows context of activity.

title: Together and Alone
picture_context: Children hold hands (together); one stands apart (alone).
vignette: כֻּלָּם יַחַד. אָרוּאֵלְיָה לְבַד.
description: Direct adverb usage for together/alone as predicate modifiers.

title: Now and Then
picture_context: Children point to a clock for 'now' and one for 'then.'
vignette: עַתָּה אוֹכִים. אָז שָׁחַקְנוּ.
description: Shows simple time adverb and past tense contrast within the same sentence.

title: Laugh and Weep
picture_context: Children alternate between laughing and wiping tears.
vignette: יִצְחָק צָחַק. אָרוּאֵלְיָה בָּכְתָה. אַחְשָׁו כֻּלָּם שָׂמֵחַ.
description: Contrasts opposite emotional actions with clear simple verbs and final group state.

title: Before and After
picture_context: Children line up; a minion stands before and after them.
vignette: מִינְיוֹן לִפְנֵי. מִינְיוֹן אַחֲרֵי.
description: Demonstrates opposite prepositions with repeated noun, reinforcing order concepts.

title: House or Field?
picture_context: Children in house, others outside in a field.
vignette: יִצְחָק בַּבַּיִת. אֶבֶן בַּשָּׂדֶה.
description: Simple use of prepositions and definite articles for contrasting locations.

title: Eat or Drink?
picture_context: A child with bread, another with a cup.
vignette: יִצְחָק אוֹכֵל לֶחֶם. אֶבֶן שֹׁתֶה מַיִם.
description: Demonstrates coordination of different action verbs (eat/drink) with objects.

title: Sun and Moon
picture_context: Children look at the sun, then at the moon.
vignette: בַּבֹּקֶר יֵשׁ שֶׁמֶשׁ. בַּלַּיְלָה יֵשׁ יָרֵחַ.
description: Reinforces basic nouns for celestial objects and their typical times.

title: Fast and Slow
picture_context: Children race: one runs quickly, another walks slowly.
vignette: יִצְחָק רָץ מַהֵר. אֶבֶן הוֹלֵךְ לְאַט.
description: Contrasts manner adverbs modifying verbs for speed of action.

title: High and Low
picture_context: One child stands on a chair, another sits on the floor.
vignette: אֶבֶן עָלוֹהַּ. אָרוּאֵלְיָה נָמוּכָה.
description: Simple use of adjectives to describe relative position.

title: On or Under?
picture_context: A dog on a table; a cat under the table.
vignette: כֶּלֶב עַל שֻׁלְחָן. חָתוּל תַּחַת שֻׁלְחָן.
description: Contrasts spatial prepositions; reinforces object identification.

title: Time to Sleep
picture_context: Children lie down and cover with a blanket.
vignette: בֵּין בַּיְלָה יִצְחָק שֹׁכֵב. אָרוּאֵלְיָה עֵינֵיהָ סְגוּרוֹת.
description: Demonstrates present participle and adjective agreement, integrated with time.

title: Door Open, Door Closed
picture_context: One scene with an open door, one with it closed.
vignette: הַדֶּלֶת פְּתוּחָה. הַדֶּלֶת סְגוּרָה.
description: Focuses on participial adjectives for states of objects.

title: Eat with Hands
picture_context: Children eat bread, using their hands.
vignette: אֶבֶן אוֹכֵל לֶחֶם בְּיָד. יִצְחָק אוֹכֵל לֶחֶם בְּיָד.
description: Practices use of the instrumental preposition with repeated verb-object phrase.

title: Hot and Cold
picture_context: Children stand by a fire, then shiver in the snow.
vignette: אֶשׁ חַם. שֶׁלֶג קָר.
description: Demonstrates use of adjectives as predicates with inanimate subjects.

title: Go and Come
picture_context: Children leave a room and return in another frame.
vignette: יִצְחָק הוֹלֵךְ. יִצְחָק בָּא.
description: Contrasts opposing verbs of motion in simple singular subject context.

title: Where Is?
picture_context: A child looks behind a curtain, another under a bed.
vignette: אֵיפֹה שְׂמִיכָה? שְׂמִיכָה תַּחַת הַמִּטָּה.
description: Integrates question structure (location inquiry) with prepositional answer.

title: We Sing, We Dance
picture_context: Children sing and dance in a circle.
vignette: כֻּלָּם שָׁרִים. כֻּלָּם רוֹקְדִים.
description: Plural subject with simple present verbs and collective activity.

title: Give Thanks
picture_context: Children (and minions) smile, hands outstretched.
vignette: נֹדִים לַמִּינְיוֹנִים. נֹדִים לְכֻּלָּם.
description: Simple polite phrase structure, regular indirect object preposition.

title: Good and Bad
picture_context: Children clean their room, then make a mess.
vignette: יֵשׁ דָּבָר טוֹב. יֵשׁ דָּבָר רַע.
description: Juxtaposition of positive and negative adjective for recurring concept.

title: Help and Thank
picture_context: Child falls; another helps them up.
vignette: נָפַל יִצְחָק. אֶבֶן עוֹזֵר. יִצְחָק אוֹמֵר: תּוֹדָה.
description: Action sequence with helper and polite closure; subject changes highlighted.

title: Strong and Weak
picture_context: Children arm-wrestle; one wins, one loses.
vignette: אֶבֶן חָזָק. אָרוּאֵלְיָה חַלָּשָׁה.
description: Opposite adjectives for contrasting strength; gender agreement shown.

title: Look and Find
picture_context: Children search a room, one finds a toy.
vignette: הֵם מְחַפְּשִׂים. אֶחָד מָצָא.
description: Search and discovery verbs in plural and singular context.

title: Want and Have
picture_context: Child wants a ball; minion hands it to them.
vignette: אָדָם רוֹצֶה כַּדוּר. יֵשׁ לְאָדָם כַּדוּר.
description: Expresses desire; existential structure ties to object possession.

title: Remember and Forget
picture_context: Child tries to recall where they put something.
vignette: אֶבֶן זוֹכֵר. יִצְחָק שׁוֹכֵחַ.
description: Contrasts opposite verbs of memory; subject alignment shown.

title: Show and Hide
picture_context: A child reveals a toy; another covers it.
vignette: אֶבֶן מַרְאֶה. אָרוּאֵלְיָה מַסְתִּירָה.
description: Causative verb patterns; contrasting actions with same subject type.

title: Strong Wind
picture_context: Children hold onto their hats against the wind.
vignette: רוּחַ חֲזָקָה. מְאֹד חֲזָקָה.
description: Adjective-noun agreement and intensifier adverb in short phrase.

title: Voice and Silence
picture_context: A child shouts, another sits quietly.
vignette: קוֹל גָּדוֹל. שֶׁקֶט בַּחֶדֶר.
description: Simple noun use for contrasting noise and silence within place.

title: Bless and Curse
picture_context: Children bless each other; a mischievous minion frowns.
vignette: עוֹשִׂים בְּרָכָה. אֵין קְלָלָה.
description: Juxtaposition of positive and negative noun forms; use of negation.

title: Love and Hate
picture_context: Children hug each other; a mean Koopa frowns.
vignette: אֶבֶן אוֹהֵב אֶת יִצְחָק. הַקוּפָּה שׂוֹנֵא.
description: Direct object marker used to reinforce verb-object construction; shows polar opposites.

title: Full and Empty
picture_context: Children pour out a cup; one is full, one empty.
vignette: הַכּוֹס מְלֵאָה. הַכּוֹס רֵיקָה.
description: Adjective-noun agreement for states of being; repeated objects highlighted.

title: Tell and Listen
picture_context: One child speaks, others listen.
vignette: יְסַפֵּר אֶבֶן. יִצְחָק שׁוֹמֵעַ.
description: Integration of piel/paal binyan verbs in context.

title: Go and Return
picture_context: Children leave a house and later come back.
vignette: כֻּלָּם הָלְכוּ. כֻּלָּם חָזְרוּ.
description: Simple group movement with subject-verb agreement.

title: Way and Path
picture_context: Children choose different paths in a park.
vignette: דֶּרֶךְ אַחַת. דֶּרֶךְ שֵׁנִית.
description: Ordinal use and noun repetition for differentiating options.

title: Ask and Answer
picture_context: Children take turns asking and answering questions.
vignette: יִצְחָק שׁוֹאֵל. אֶבֶן עוֹנֶה.
description: Simple dialogue structure; clear subject assignment.

title: Rise and Fall
picture_context: Child jumps up, then sits down on the ground.
vignette: יִצְחָק קָם. יִצְחָק נָפַל.
description: Contrasting active movement verbs with same subject.

title: Guard and Leave
picture_context: Minion guards a bag while children walk away.
vignette: מִינְיוֹן שׁוֹמֵר. יִצְחָק עָזַב.
description: Guard/leave actions in unity for subject-verb mastery.

title: Give and Take
picture_context: Children exchange toys.
vignette: יִצְחָק נָתַן. אֶבֶן לָקַח.
description: Action swap highlights direct mode of transfer.

title: Choose and Refuse
picture_context: Children select items; one rejects a choice.
vignette: יִצְחָק בָּחַר. אֶבֶן מֵאֵן.
description: Presents opposite verbs of volition as a pair.

title: Begin and End
picture_context: Start and finish a block tower.
vignette: הַמִּגְדָּל רֵאשִׁית. הַמִּגְדָּל סוֹף.
description: Integration of nouns for event markers; beginning and end.
